feed.title: Tag: magento uk | Edmonds Commerce Dev Blog

entry.title: Magento UK Developers Group on Linked In
entry.content:
I have decided to launch a Magento UK Developers group on Linked in. Mainly because we don’t already have one and in that respect are lagging behind other countries like France. Of course that can’t be right so I felt obliged to rectify the situation immediately.

You can see the all new Magento UK Developers group on Linked.in right now.

I had to specify a web page, so for now this blog post will do pending something better.
